name: a dark dungeon (Pyrofanis)
description:
the game was made in partnership with maniac22(maniac22.itch.io) in two days for the 46th ludum dare game jam(lundum dare submission link:https://maniac22.itch.io/a-dark-dungeon) its an isometric action game .

theme:keep it alive

your purpose is to protect the flame(a child's soul)  while you traverse the dungeons of widow a demonic figure that captures souls as they move into the realms of the dead at your pathway you will face 3  kinds of its demonic minions

first are the hounds which with their outstanding speed will be able to reach you at ease
second are the mindless zombiefied souls of those who weren't able to escape
third are the widows sister's 
and last the widow her self

the game consists of three rooms with a boss room

IMPORTANT:

KEEP THE FLAME BY YOUR SIDE AT ALL COST!!!
